rows.label: qev024191_MSG0001
rows.name:
All of the xenoforms who have come to this city have
been good people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0002
rows.name: All of them except for the Orphe, that is![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0003
rows.name:
I heard a rustling sound coming from the garden
earlier, and went to see what it was...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0004
rows.name:
And what did I find? That Orphean, Ton'barac,
chowing down on the beautiful garden I'd poured
my heart into maintaining![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0005
rows.name:
His human friend apologized profusely for his behavior,
so I didn't report him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0006
rows.name:
But now I can't stop worrying about the possibility
that he might come back. I'm so stressed out,
I'm barely getting eight hours of sleep a night![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_JNK0010
rows.name: Enlighten[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_SEL0011
rows.name: Explain that the Orphe are no threat to humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_JNK0020
rows.name: Warn[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_SEL0021
rows.name:
Fan the flames by claiming that
Orpheans are dangerous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0007
rows.name:
...Wait. You say they're working night and day to
make weapons for BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0008
rows.name:
...And that Ton'barac has become an avid tennis
player in an attempt to understand humans...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0009
rows.name:
Hmm... You know, I was in the tennis club back in
high school.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0010
rows.name: Maybe I should invite him to play sometime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0011
rows.name:
Hey, yeah! If we work up a little sweat together,
I bet he won't seem so scary![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0012
rows.name:
I guess I'd better go get my racket out of storage, huh?
Thanks for the advice![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0013
rows.name:
I knew it! No decent creature could so casually destroy
a garden that I'd put so much love into![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0014
rows.name:
I bet he and his compatriots are plotting to team up
and come eat the rest of the plants![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0015
rows.name:
That settles it. I'm going to go talk to Jim from the
Mediators and have him stand guard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0016
rows.name:
Then I'll go stock up on bug repellent so I'm ready to
repel Ton'barac's next attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024191_MSG0017
rows.name:
I will protect my garden from any xenoform,
no matter how ferocious it may be![ST:wait ]
